rag.name: RAG Agent
rag.description: Retrieves relevant context from your documents to answer questions accurately.

capabilities.name: question_answering
capabilities.description: Answers questions using information from your documents
examples: What is the definition of credit risk?
Explain the requirements for AML compliance
Summarize the main points about data protection

capabilities.name: citation
examples: What are the key elements of GDPR with citations?
How is PCI DSS compliance defined? Cite sources.

parameters.name: top_k
parameters.description: Number of results to retrieve from the knowledge base

parameters.name: hybrid_search
parameters.description: Whether to use hybrid search (vector + keyword)

rag.author: RegulAite Team

compliance_mapping.name: Compliance Mapping Agent
compliance_mapping.description: Maps requirements between different compliance frameworks and standards.

capabilities.name: control_mapping
capabilities.description: Maps controls between different compliance frameworks
examples: Map PCI DSS requirement 3.4 to ISO 27001
Find GDPR equivalents for CCPA requirements
Compare NIST 800-53 controls with SOC 2

capabilities.name: gap_analysis
examples: What controls in ISO 27001 are not covered by SOC 2?
Identify gaps between HIPAA and GDPR for data protection

parameters.name: detail_level
parameters.description: Level of detail for the mapping

compliance_mapping.author: RegulAite Team

vulnerability_assessment.name: Vulnerability Assessment Agent
vulnerability_assessment.description: Assesses vulnerabilities and security risks based on provided information.

capabilities.name: risk_identification
capabilities.description: Identifies potential security risks and vulnerabilities
examples: What are the security risks in our cloud infrastructure?
Identify vulnerabilities in our authentication system
Assess risks in our customer data handling processes

capabilities.name: remediation_recommendations
examples: How can we address the identified authentication vulnerabilities?
Recommend actions to mitigate data storage risks

parameters.name: assessment_area
parameters.description: Area to focus the vulnerability assessment on

parameters.name: risk_level
parameters.description: Minimum risk level to include in assessment

vulnerability_assessment.author: RegulAite Team

threat_modeling.name: Threat Modeling Agent
threat_modeling.description: Creates threat models for systems and processes to identify security risks.

capabilities.name: threat_identification
capabilities.description: Identifies potential threats to a system or process
examples: What are the threats to our payment processing system?
Identify potential threats to our user authentication flow
Create a threat model for our data storage architecture

capabilities.name: mitigation_strategies
capabilities.description: Suggests strategies to mitigate identified threats
examples: How can we mitigate the threats to our API endpoints?
Suggest security controls for our cloud infrastructure threats

parameters.name: system_name
parameters.description: Name of the system to model

parameters.name: system_components
parameters.description: List of system components to include in the model

threat_modeling.author: RegulAite Team

dynamic_tree.name: Dynamic Tree Reasoning Agent
dynamic_tree.description: Dynamically generates and uses decision trees for complex reasoning tasks.

capabilities.name: tree_generation
capabilities.description: Generates decision trees based on the query and context
examples: Analyze the compliance implications of our new data processing method
Evaluate the security risks of our cloud migration strategy
Assess whether our current controls meet PCI DSS requirements

capabilities.name: explainable_reasoning
examples: Explain the reasoning behind the compliance assessment
Show the decision path for the security evaluation

parameters.name: reasoning_depth
parameters.description: Maximum depth of the decision tree

parameters.name: show_reasoning
parameters.description: Whether to show the reasoning process

parameters.name: cache_tree
parameters.description: Whether to cache the generated tree for future use

dynamic_tree.author: RegulAite Team
